issue.title: [Docs] Does arrow support S3 bucket retention period setting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16075](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16075). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I cannot find any doc mentioning how to set the object lock (retention) period when creating a bucket (dir) via arrow's S3 support. Is there a way for doing such thing within arrow?

Thanks
